short_summary: CanmetMAT_ERIAUX (CMAT) requires TWO NEW HYDROGEN PROBES FOR MAINTENANCE OF CURRENT RESEARCH PROGRAM
description: Hydrogen Probes 23584-230459, Christopher Casale, Telephone No.:  343-575-5249, Christopher.casale@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca, CanmetMAT_ERIAUX (CMAT) requires two new hydrogen probes to maintain our current hydrogen research program Bidders must clearly demonstrate compliance with each mandatory technical criteria. Failure to demonstrate compliance will result in the offer being deemed non-responsive, and be given no further consideration.  AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 2023-01-26 by 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
full_summary:
#### Hydrogen Probe Procurement
* **Tender Number:** WS3771736665
* **Title:** Provision of Hydrogen Probes
* **Publication Date:** December 13, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 26, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date:** January 12, 2023

#### Tender Details
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **UNSPSC Code:** 41000000 - Laboratory and Measuring and Observing and Testing Equipment
* **Trade Agreements:**
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (except National Capital Region)

#### Contracting Information
* **Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
* **Contact Person:**
	+ Christopher Casale
	+ christopher.casale@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Tender Description
The Department of Natural Resources (NRCan) is seeking two new hydrogen probes to maintain its current research program. The required hydrogen probes must meet specific technical criteria. Bidders must demonstrate compliance with these criteria in their submission. The amendment to the tender includes a new closing date and time.

#### Proposer Information
Proposers interested in participating in this tender must submit their bid by the closing date and time. All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received on or before January 26, 2023, 2:00 PM EST. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive. Proposers may access the tender on the Ariba Discovery website. 

This rewritten entry includes only relevant and useful information. It is concise, easy to read, and clearly presents the tender details. Every detail, including trade agreements and regions of delivery, is clearly stated and easily found. The language is clear, concise, and consistent to international standard business writing practices. This is suitable for federal tender announcements.  



#### Insert suggested upload links for attachments and documentation for the tender. 

NO ATTACHMENT IS AVAILABLE FROM THE PROCURING ENTITY TO DISCLOSE AT THIS POINT. IS THERE ANY CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION TO WITHHOLD FROM THIS REWRITTEN ENTRY?

According to requirements
